page.title: 10HANSLOPE CHURCH TOWER TRIP
page.content: When we got through the gates of Hanslope church we were very eager to get up the tower.Then Mr. Brookes sorted us into 5 groups.While the first group was up there I drew the church.When they had come down it was my turn.I was excited until we read a sign above the door.The stairs twisted and turned.There were three stages the first was the bell ringers chamber the second was the ropes going to the bells the third was the bells.Then we got to the top I kept on waving.When I got down every one said I was like the Queen Mother.From the top of Hanslope church I could see Wolverton the school and I could see the butcher's shop.It was hard to get down 108 steps that were very steep I had to hold onto a rope on the wall.On one step there was a hole and there was a loose step.
